    • Constructor Detail

      • WordSearchPuzzle

        public WordSearchPuzzle(java.util.List<java.lang.String> userSpecifiedWords)
        Takes a list already created by the user and uses those words to populate the puzzle
        Parameters:
        userSpecifiedWords - The list of words to eb inserted into the puzzleWords list

      • WordSearchPuzzle

        public WordSearchPuzzle(java.lang.String wordFile,
                        int wordCount,
                        int shortest,
                        int longest)
        Takes a file parameter and properties for the words to be chosen from the file
        Parameters:
        wordFile - The name of the file in the format fileName.txt
        wordCount - The amount of words to be randomly chosen from the file
        shortest - The length of the shortest word to be included
        longest - The length of the longest word to be included

    • Method Detail

        Returns:

      • getPuzzleAsString

        public java.lang.String getPuzzleAsString()
        Returns:
        The puzzle is returned as a formatted String with just the wordsearch puzzle

      • showWordSearchPuzzle

        public void showWordSearchPuzzle(boolean hide)
        Prints the wordsearch puzzle out on the console showing the words used and optionally their directions
        Parameters:
        hide - Hides/Unhides the directions to find the words in
